remarks.para: One may be inoperative OFF provided associated EICAS message and all other pack indications are operative.

placard.para: Placard affected OFF light "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Make sure affected pack L (R) PACK OFF advisory message is displayed on upper EICAS (pack off). (NOTE: press RECALL as necessary to display message.)
Make sure affected pack advisory message is not displayed.
Make sure affected pack L (R) PACK OFF advisory message is displayed.
